topics.body: I guess what I'm getting at is you know how the Whig party died out?  Well think of both the current republican party and democrat party as the whig party.  If a anti-authoritarian party shows up they'll get so many of the votes that it'll fuck both republicans and democrats.  If a anti-authoritarian party showed up it would force both parties to adopt anti-authoritarian ideology or face extinction.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5528a0596368723f44820700#post_5528a0596368723f44820700
I fucking knew it. They always seemed like hippie types who find the normal left wing platform too restricting.
Hence a lot of their views on consent. 



"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5528a06d63687271be9a0d00#post_5528a06d63687271be9a0d00
Maybe paleo-cons can come back. They're not exactly anti-authoritarian but they are certainly less so than neo-cons.
They're idea is "we'll let people fail unless it negatively affects lots of other people."

 "@Meresflut":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5528a0a36368722ca1691000#post_5528a0a36368722ca1691000
Why not?
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5528a10c6368722ca1d91000#post_5528a10c6368722ca1d91000
There are actually multiple anti-authority parties in existence, though I doubt they'll make much headway due to the fact that they're already estabilished as being for crazy (green party), greedy (libertarian), or racist (peace and freedom, which is essentially the far right of the far right) and so regarded by prospective voters as essentially throwing their votes away.

This isn't even getting into all the even smaller parties that put out presidential candidates, the real niche groups like the American Nazi Party, the Socialists and so on.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5528a2b66368722ca1921200#post_5528a2b66368722ca1921200
The one thing missing for another party to take control at this point is one thing:
A leader who can speak well in front of people and without a script.  Hypothetically speaking if there was such a individual as the head of the party they would easily touch upon the super majority's feelings and propel the party forwards.

The problem with the two parties currently is the belief that they could never in a million years lose and that they believe that in 10,000,000 AD that the republican party and democrat party will still exist.  This belief is extremely dangerous politically.
